anime.description: http://anidb.net/ch89011 [Minori] is an illness-stricken, constantly bullied orphan girl. After one rainy day, she doesn`t turn up at school, having been admitted into a hospital in a distant town. Two months pass, and the girl`s two school friends, http://anidb.net/ch89010 [Takashi] and http://anidb.net/ch89006 [Kyouko], receive a mysterious email with no sender listed. The email reveals a summer festival taking place at a nearby town... Source: ANN

tag.name: novel
tag.description: A novel is a relatively long work of narrative fiction, normally written in prose form, and which is typically published as a book. Manga, comics, or visual novels do not fit this description and are not considered novels; including a small number of illustrations, however, is still permissible, which means that light novels are considered novels.

tag.name: short episodes
tag.description: Short episodes are regular episodes that are much shorter than the standard length. This means up to and including 10 minutes; shows with episodes that are 11 to 20 minutes in length are http://anidb.net/t6494 [half-length episodes] instead. Not to be confused with http://anidb.net/t6349 [multi-segment episodes], which are regular episodes that are split into several short segments (parts), usually with separate titles and independent storylines.

episode.title: 水族館
The Aquarium
수족관
Suizokukan
episode.summary: The weekend they`ve waited for is here, and the three head out for the aquarium in the neighboring town, where they won`t have to worry about anyone seeing them. While they take their first steps into the special Clione exhibition, Minori`s guardian gets called to the hospital. Source: amazon

episode.title: 勇気
Courage
용기
Yuuki
episode.summary: Kyoko is thrilled to learn there`s another girl on Minori`s side, but she hates herself for shutting down as soon as she gets into the classroom. Takashi tries to cheer her up by suggesting they might come up with a solution when they all visit the local aquarium. Source: amazon

episode.title: 約束
Promise
약속
Yakusoku
episode.summary: One rainy afternoon, Takashi and Kyoko spot Minori standing alone on the street and call out to her. Later, they make a promise that brings Minori to tears. Source: amazon

episode.title: 独りぼっち
All Alone
외톨이
Hitoribocchi
episode.summary: Minori is the bullies` favorite target, and always alone, but Takashi and Kyoko want to see her smile. However, the hostile classroom environment holds them back from being able to take a single step in the right direction. Source: amazon

episode.title: クリオネの灯り放送直前特番「音楽の灯り」
Episode S1
Clione no Akari Housou Chokuzen Tokuban "Ongaku no Akari"
小さな灯台
A Tiny Lighthouse
작은 등대
Chiisana Toudai
episode.summary: The trio make their way from the shrine to a lighthouse by the sea, where they`re granted to the beautiful sight of the lights of their town. As they identify each light in their day-to-day lives, the lonely feelings hidden in their hearts spill forth. Source: amazon

episode.title: 祭の賑わい
The Bustling Festival
축제의 흥겨움
Matsuri no Nigiwai
episode.summary: The reunited trio is enjoying the summer festival- until they run into some bully boys from their class! When they try to run away, they bump into three other classmates, who treat them in a surprisingly different way. Source: amazon

episode.title: 百日の花
One Hundred Days` Flower
백일의 꽃
Hyakunichi no Hana
episode.summary: Rumors say Minori will never come back to school. As summer vacation starts, Takashi and Kyoko receive a mysterious text message with no information on who sent it, telling them of the summer festival at a familiar shrine. Source: amazon

episode.title: また明日
See You Tomorrow
내일 봐
Mata Ashita
episode.summary: The trio is on their way home from the aquarium, and Kyoko and Takashi still haven`t come up with a plan to help Minori, but they decide to keep making sure she`s never left all on her own. All seems for naught, however, when Minori stops coming to school. Source: amazon

episode.title: クリオネの灯り
Lights of the Clione
클리오네의 불빛
Clione no Akari
episode.summary: Takashi and Kyoko, with Minori`s cell phone in hand, vow to text Minori and keep the promise they made to her that rainy day. Together, they look towards the future. Source: amazon

episode.title: 未来の想い出
Memories of the Future
미래의 추억
Mirai no Omoide
episode.summary: Minori`s texts, written with no cell service and said to be deleted, make their way to Takashi and Kyoko, a miracle that comes about from the feelings shared between them. Source: amazon

episode.title: 祭りの後, 朝の光
After the Festival, the Morning Light
축제를 마친 뒤, 아침의 빛
Matsuri no Ato, Asa no Hikari
episode.summary: When Minori disappears, leaving only her phone behind, Kyoko and Takashi enlist their classmates` help searching for her. When they find out what`s happened to Minori, they see the one text she never sent and take a guess at who really sent the mystery text. Source: amazon

episode.title: 灯台とテトラポッド
The Lighthouse and the Tetrapods
등대와 테트라포드
Toudai to Tetrapod
episode.summary: Minori realizes it`s time to go and tries to disappear, but she instinctively takes Takashi and Kyoko`s outstretched hands. As the rain falls all around them, they spend a few last moments under the roof of a beach house. Source: amazon
